name: Colorfire
description:
Colorfire is an small arcade webgl game of shooting into enemies and surviving the most time possible.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Fire: Left Click
  • Dash: Right click / Q (costs 20 points)
  • Molotov: Middle click / E (costs from 100 points and increases each use)
  • Pause: Esc

There are many different enemies you can fight and the difficulty increases with time

This is my first Unity game made in about 3 days. Hopefully you like it :D

Warning: Game contains bright changing colors, if you have an epilleptic condition or some family member does, we encourage you to not play this game.

Update v1.01: Fixed a crash where exploding a barrel very close to 1 or more other barrels (those "!" enemies) resulted in a infinite loop and ended in a crash.

Update v1.02: Kinda attempted to fix a random crash with barrels once again. Patch may or may not fix the issue but anyways, at least tried.

Update v1.03: Fixed another nullreferenceexception due to a wrongly established layermask.

Update v1.04: Added some alternative keys for some actions as requested. Now all enemies explode after a while, making it harder to surround enemies and farm time. Increased general max enemy cap

Music: Hysics - Pressure Route
